version_description:
Attention!

A new update is available for Mech Arena that will optimize your performance and provide you with superior, more stable gameplay.

Update Mech Arena: Robot Showdown today for the best possible experience.

Attention!

A new update is available for Mech Arena that will optimize your performance and provide you with superior, more stable gameplay.

Update Mech Arena: Robot Showdown today for the best possible experience.

What's new in this version:

- Performance optimization

A new and exciting Mech Arena update is here!

- Tournaments. Fight in time-limited events that take place over multiple Heats. Participate in each Heat to get Rewards!
- Team Deathmatch Mode. Engage in Battle and crush your opponents over multiple Rounds
- New Maps. Destroy enemy Mechs in Team Deathmatches on brand new Maps
- Assists. Improve your Score in a Team Deathmatch for dealing damage before the enemy Mech is down!
- Apple Sign-in. Save your progress with this new feature

What's new in this version:

- Performance optimization
- Gameplay stability improvements

What's new in this version:

- Performance optimization
- Gameplay stability improvements

What's new in this version:

- Performance optimization
- Gameplay stability improvements

Attention!

Mech Arena is now faster, better, and smoother than ever. Update Mech Arena: Robot Showdown and dive into the madness!

We've done what we can to make your experience seamless and fast. Winning, though, is up to you!

What's new in this version:

- Performance optimization
- Gameplay stability improvements
- Smoother game experience

What's new in this version:

- Performance optimization
- Gameplay stability improvements

The new update has arrived. What's new:

- Arachnos. This powerful Mech deploys a small destructible turret and attacks approaching enemies. Engage in the brand new Derby Event and receive Arachnos as the final reward!
- Weekly Objectives. Complete a new batch of tasks as part of the Daily & Weekly Event.
- Various Improvements. Open x10 Crates, remove Inventory notifications in one tap, scroll through news posts, and more great conveniences.

What's new in this version:

- Performance optimization
- Gameplay stability improvements
- Smoother game experience
